process.label: Donate
process.content: BLKLUG [ORG] is a H2H (Heart 2 Heart) BLK LUV donation economy that allows fans, customers, of business to donate to each other earning 100% in Bitcoin Love Cash Money.

process.label: Mint
process.content: Click the Linktr.ee/blkluvorg mint link to mint L$VE $RNT or HAI$ to your Phantom.app mobile wallet.

process.label: Sell
process.content: Sell your Love Cash Money in the BLKLUV [ORG] Linktree shop, in any BLKLUV Discord network or to anyone that you know as a payment method for you educating them on how the purpose economy works for them.

process.label: Live
process.content: Promote your products or services on LIVE.BLKLUV.org through a scheduled and promoted episode show, allowing the host to receive live donations.

process.label: TV
process.content: BLKLUV TV is the new Bitcoin-based platform similar to YouTube, showcasing top Love Money creator videos for 24 hours. It features the creators' Love bank account addresses, enabling viewers from around the world to make Love Money donations.

process.label: History
process.content: BLKLUV [ORG] is making history by minting blockchain content sold by creators who promote Love Money for free. This serves as a go-to-market strategy for onboarding the masses to the purpose economy, providing a solution to inflation.
